Package ohos.ai.cv.common

Class VisionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.ai.cv.common.VisionManager

  • public class VisionManager
extends Object
    Provides methods for initializing HUAWEI HiAI Engine services and CV abilities.

    Example operations include connecting to or disconnecting from HUAWEI HiAI Engine services, and obtaining detection method instances.

    Since:
    1

      • init

        public static int init​(Context context,
                       ConnectionCallback connectionCallback)
        Initializes HUAWEI HiAI Engine services.
        Parameters:
        context - Indicates the HarmonyOS context.
        connectionCallback - Indicates a callback to asynchronously initialize HUAWEI HiAI Engine services.
        Returns:
        Returns a status code. For more information, see HwHiAIResultCode.
        Since:
        1

      • getBarcodeDetector

        public static IBarcodeDetector getBarcodeDetector​(Context context)
        Obtains an IBarcodeDetector instance.

        The parameter value is passed by the caller, and the value range is determined by the variable type.

        Parameters:
